Package com.iontrading.mkv

Interface MkvOnBehalfOfFeatureLicenseManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MkvLicenseManager
    @Keep
@KeepClassMembers
@KeepPublicClassMemberNames
public interface MkvOnBehalfOfFeatureLicenseManager
    This interface provides the access to on-behalf-of requests of by-feature licenses. Through MkvLicenseManager.requestOnBehalfOf(String, String, String, int) the application can request an on-behalf-of by-feature licenses. The listeners to process the license request outcome can be installed via MkvLicenseManager.addOnBehalfOfFeatureLicenseListener(String, MkvOnBehalfOfFeatureLicenseListener) and it will be installed on a per virtual-component basis.
    See Also:
    MkvLicenseManager, MkvOnBehalfOfFeatureLicenseManager

      Add an MkvOnBehalfOfByFeatureLicenseListener to which deliver license events related to the specified component.
      int getAcquiredOnBehalfOf​(String component, String feature)
      Retrieve the number of acquired licenses for a given feature on behalf of the component identified by the input token.
      boolean isOnBehalfOfFeatureSupported()
      Returns true if the registration daemon supports the by-feature licenses on-behalf-of.
      boolean removeOnBehalfOfFeatureLicenseListener​(String component, MkvOnBehalfOfFeatureLicenseListener listener)
      Remove the MkvOnBehalfOfByFeatureLicenseListener from the listeners used to deliver license events related to the specified component.
      void requestOnBehalfOf​(String component, String token, String feature, int number)
      Attempt to acquire the requested number of licenses for a feature on behalf of the component.

    • Method Detail

      • requestOnBehalfOf

        void requestOnBehalfOf​(String component,
                       String token,
                       String feature,
                       int number)
                throws MkvUnregisteredStatusException,
                       MkvUnsupportedOperationException,
                       MkvException
        Attempt to acquire the requested number of licenses for a feature on behalf of the component.
        Parameters:
        component - the name of the component to which the by-feature licenses will be associated.
        feature - the feature to request licenses for.
        token - the token obtained during the registration of on behalf of component.
        number - the number of requested licenses.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if at least one parameter is null.
        IllegalArgumentException - if at least one parameter is an empty string or number is less or equals to 0.
        MkvUnregisteredStatusException - if this component is not registered on the platform.
        MkvUnsupportedOperationException - if the Daemon does not support this operation or the Daemon function is temporary unavailable.
        MkvException - if an MkvException occurs during the execution of this request.

      • getAcquiredOnBehalfOf

        int getAcquiredOnBehalfOf​(String component,
                          String feature)
        Retrieve the number of acquired licenses for a given feature on behalf of the component identified by the input token.
        Parameters:
        component - the name of the component to which the by-feature license is associated.
        feature - the feature to query.
        Returns:
        the number of licenses acquired for the queried feature.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if component or feature is null.
        IllegalArgumentException - if component or feature is an empty string.

      • addOnBehalfOfFeatureLicenseListener

        boolean addOnBehalfOfFeatureLicenseListener​(String component,
                                            MkvOnBehalfOfFeatureLicenseListener listener)
        Add an MkvOnBehalfOfByFeatureLicenseListener to which deliver license events related to the specified component.
        Parameters:
        component - the component name.
        listener - the listener.
        Returns:
        false if the provided listener has already been added for the specified component.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if component or listener is null.
        IllegalArgumentException - if component is an empty string.

      • removeOnBehalfOfFeatureLicenseListener

        boolean removeOnBehalfOfFeatureLicenseListener​(String component,
                                               MkvOnBehalfOfFeatureLicenseListener listener)
        Remove the MkvOnBehalfOfByFeatureLicenseListener from the listeners used to deliver license events related to the specified component.
        Parameters:
        component - the component name.
        listener - the listener.
        Returns:
        false if the provided listener was not registered.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if component or listener is null.
        IllegalArgumentException - if component is an empty string.

      • isOnBehalfOfFeatureSupported

        boolean isOnBehalfOfFeatureSupported()
        Returns true if the registration daemon supports the by-feature licenses on-behalf-of.
        Returns:
        true if the registration daemon supports the by-feature licenses on-behalf-of.
